metadata.purpose: Series-based taxonomy with complete year coverage using comma-delimited year lists for AI/ML coin classification

field_abbreviations.total_years: total number of years in production
field_abbreviations.kw: identification_keywords (array of search terms and descriptors)
field_abbreviations.cn: common_names (array of popular names for this series)
field_abbreviations.years: comma-delimited string of all production years

optimization_strategies: Complete year coverage via comma-delimited year lists
Abbreviated field names to reduce token usage
